review: I am thoroughly satisfied with the Prestige Medical 5.5" StyleMate Utility Scissor, Daisies Aqua Sea. The scissors are exactly as advertised, featuring a unique and stylish design that stands out. They are made from high-quality 420 surgical-grade stainless steel, ensuring durability and reliability. The milled shear serrations make cutting precise and effortless, and the autoclavable feature is a significant plus for maintaining hygiene. The price is also very reasonable, making this a great value for the quality and functionality provided. Overall, these scissors meet all my expectations and are a fantastic addition to my toolkit.
